alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN NUECES... SOUTHWESTERN SAN PATRICIO AND NORTHEASTERN JIM WELLS COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Patricio, or 7 miles south of Mathis, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... San Patricio, Sandia, Bluntzer, and Edroy. This includes Interstate 37 between mile markers 23 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells
